channel.title: Question regarding putting server online
channel.description: I know how to port forward and all but it will say it my server is online and yet nobody can connect, I was wondering if someone who was familiar with teamviewer could help me get my server online, automatic co-owner to whoever can help me.

item.title: Question regarding putting server online
item.dc:creator: @afterdeath15 afterdeath15
item.description:
@afterdeath15 wrote:

I used a port check tool and it shows i’m port forwarded, set variables, changed server IP in my client folder and everything, it even lets me put my server on the serverstatus page but yet when I try logging in it still says error connecting to server, any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Question regarding putting server online
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

afterdeath15:

my ports are acting up

I wish I knew what this meant. You probably didn’t port foward correctly or your client isn’t connecting to port 43594 (default rsps port).

Read full topic

item.title: Question regarding putting server online
item.dc:creator: @afterdeath15 afterdeath15
item.description:
@afterdeath15 wrote:

Done, done, and done. still not working and now my ports are acting up, I hate having a verizon modem smh :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Question regarding putting server online
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

I assume you have little to no java experience. You’ll need to have the following things in order for other players to connect to your server.

[ul][] Ports forwarded
[] Environmental variables set
[*] Client connects to an IP that isn’t a default gateway (i.e. 127.0.0.1 or 192.168.1.1)[/ul]

If you don’t have all of these, no one can connect to your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Question regarding putting server online
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I don’t think anybody’s going to help over teamviewer, try check if your ports are open using http://canyouseeme.org/

Read full topic
